common_steps: 3. Go to login and login as wiener(username) and peter(password)
burpsuite: 4. For this you need burpsuite. Go to burpsuite and intercept the request with file upload
6. Go to file upload web page and open the image (That should be above the upload image button)

simple_file_upload: 4. There will be a file upload button. Upload the payload.php
5. That should say something like successfully uploaded
6. Go to file upload web page and open the image (That should be above the upload image button)
content_type: 7. Find Content-Type. There should be application/x-php
8. Remove that and keep image/png or image/jpeg
9. Send the request by send button at the top
11. Go to file upload web page and open the image (That should be above the upload image button)
path_traversal: 10. Go to file upload web page and open the image (That should be above the upload image button)
11. Instead of /files/avatar/payload.php. Enter /files/payload.php in the url and hit enter.
blacklist_bypass: 7. In the body of requests, remove the php web shell payload.
9. Change the filename. Should have filename='payload.php'.
10. After sending the request, keep the payload in the body again.
11. Then change the filename to 'payload.php2' and send.
12. Go to file upload web page and open the image (That should be above the upload image button)
null_byte: 7. In the filename, change 'payload.php' into 'payload.php%00.png'. should have filename='payload.php'
9. Go to file upload web page and open the image (That should be above the upload image button)
magic_byte: 7. In the body of request, there should be the payload.
8. Add GIF87a at the very start and send.
9. Go to file upload web page and open the image (That should be above the upload image button)

end_steps: There you go simple file upload successful. You are now a hacker.
